reporting_cycle: The Director-General of the OPCW to report to the Security Council, through the Secretary-General, within 30 days and every month thereafter
summary:
Action Group members will support the Joint Special Envoy and his team in engaging the Government and opposition, consulting Syrian society and other international actors; 

Action Group members welcome the convening of another meeting by the Joint Special Envoy if necessary to review progress and determine additional steps to address the crisis, and the Envoy will keep the UN and League of Arab States informed.
